intro: Callitriche fehmedianii, commonly known as the Fehmedian water starwort, is a small aquatic plant native to the Middle East. It typically grows in shallow, freshwater environments such as ponds and streams. The plant has slender, branching stems that float on the water surface, with small, star-shaped leaves. Its flowers are usually white or pale blue, and it blooms throughout the growing season. Callitriche fehmedianii plays a role in aquatic ecosystems by providing habitat for microorganisms and invertebrates.
